hero.title: About SD Overseas
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in the global spice trade, connecting authentic Indian flavors with markets worldwide.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bridge continents through trade, delivering authentic Indian spices worldwide while maintaining the highest standards of quality and sustainability.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the global leader in spice trade, creating meaningful connections between authentic flavors and international markets.

story.title: Our Story
content: Founded with a passion for authentic flavors, SD Overseas began as a small family business focused on sourcing the finest spices directly from farms across India.
Over the years, we've grown into a trusted partner for businesses worldwide, maintaining our commitment to quality while expanding our global reach.
Today, we continue to bridge traditions with innovation, ensuring that every spice we trade carries the authentic taste and aroma that makes Indian cuisine truly special.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do at SD Overseas

items.title: Quality First
items.description: We never compromise on quality, ensuring every spice meets our rigorous standards.

items.title: Trustworthy Partnership
items.description: Building lasting relationships based on reliability and mutual success.

items.title: Sustainable Practices
items.description: Supporting sustainable farming and environmentally responsible trade practices.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: Embracing new technologies and methods to improve our service delivery.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: A comprehensive suite of services to support your spice trading needs

globalPresence.title: Global Presence
globalPresence.subtitle: Connecting authentic Indian spices with markets across the world

cta.title: Ready to Partner With Us?
cta.subtitle: Experience the SD Overseas difference. Let us help you source the finest Indian spices for your business needs.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: Rigorous quality control ensures every spice meets international standards

support.title: Expert Support
